title: 96/156/EC: Commission Decision of 24 November 1995 amending the overall quantities of food aid under the 1995 programme
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 24 November 1995 amending the overall quantities of food aid under the 1995 programme (96/156/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The overall quantity of 'legumes` to be supplied under the 1995 food aid programme shall be 80 000 tonnes.
2. The amount of 'other products` to be supplied under the 1995 food aid programme shall be ECU 43 170 000.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 November 1995.
For the Commission
João DE DEUS PINHEIRO
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 370, 30.12.1986, p. 1; Corrigendum: OJ No L 42, 12. 2. 1987.
(2) OJ No L 174, 7. 7. 1990, p. 6.
(3) OJ No L 220, 16. 9. 1995, p. 20.
